content: tcm390: Merged 15 PRs this week with significant feature additions including OpenAI TTS support (#4255, #4259), message API implementation (#4247), and improved reply actions (#4213), alongside numerous bug fixes for Discord actions, transcription, and UI issues. Consistently active across 6 days, contributing substantial code changes (+1489/-682 lines) with a balanced focus between new features (55%) and bug fixes (32%). Created 3 issues (all now closed) and participated in code reviews, demonstrating comprehensive involvement in both development and quality assurance.
